text: Morning guys, can you use hubl to get the body class for an if statement? {% if bodyclass == %}. something like that?
Also interested in this, I get the same thing...
Can we move this under advanced or something? I have gotten over a dozen bug reports that this isn't working... People think it does something on the front end
I'm glad I'm not the only one :slightly_smiling_face:
Has anyone configured Twilio number for sales calling in HubSpot CRM? i need to know how do you verify your Twilio number at the time of adding it to HubSpot.

just to give more context, it's a Twilio number that i'm using and as soon as i click on Register button in HubSpot it says HubSpot will call this number for verification and shows a 6 digit verification code. I don't know where does this call connect because the number is not connected anywhere, it's so confusing
Twilio's documentation talks only about verification of non-twilio numbers. I don't understand why do i need to verify a number that i bought from Twilio.
Hey Everyone! Can we fetch data from HubDB into the rich text field using the dynamic pages technique that HS offers.
closest you'll get is builtin_body_classes I think :confused: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/variables#website-pages-variables>
Hey <@UGDF9EBPW> I created a custom trigger in GTM based on the `HubSpot-consent-true` event.
Cool! But how do you handle the HubSpot cookies?
The consent banner will handle the HS cookies on it’s own
Hey <@UATE4ATHP> what exactly is the issue folks are having with this feature?
They think it actually changes the background color of the module
As I feared… we can look improve the copy to make it more clear that this is *temporary* and only effects the editing experience.
Ah smart way of handling this! We can not work with accept all or nothing as the HubSpot consent banner offers. So that is my main issue.
<@UN0NUBU3S> suggestion "Enable dark editor" or something like this
Thanks for the suggestion <@U017U9BRUPP>! We’ll take that into consideration

hey <@U26BLKGE4>.. i have a quick question for you.. so we started using this but noticed.. if you go to a specific URL for example.. <https://domainname.com/url-to-page> it redirects you to the homepage.. not <https://www.domainname.com/url-to-page>.. is there a setting we are missing

we have

Type: 301
URI fowarding: No
Keep parameters: Yes
Tracking: No
I'm not 100% on that one, but my guess would be you need to enable URI forwarding
thanks.. that’s what it looks like it was
